name: handbrake-web
tagline: A web interface for managing and queuing HandBrake video transcodes
description: Handbrake-Web is a web-based UI for the HandBrake video transcoder, allowing users to queue conversions, set presets, and manage encoding jobs without the desktop GUI.

features.title: Video Transcoding Interface
features.description: Provides a web interface for managing HandBrake video conversions

features.title: Job Queue Management
features.description: Queues and processes multiple video encoding jobs

features.title: Progress Monitoring
features.description: Displays real-time encoding progress and status

features.title: Input File Handling
features.description: Accepts and manages source video files

features.title: Output Management
features.description: Stores and organizes converted video files

features.title: Browser-Based Control
features.description: Controls encoding tasks from a web browser

features.title: Self-Hosted Transcoding
features.description: Run video processing on your own servers
